div.p: Cotulla ISD is transforming our schools to help our students meet the demands of a rapidly changing world. We will empower our students to be communicators, critical thinkers, collaborators, innovators, and responsible digital citizens. We will address teaching and learning to meet the demands of the digital age. We want the students of Cotulla ISD to be ready to compete in a global environment.Â
